name: Signalboard
summary: A monitoring dashboard that unifies logs, release health, and team ownership in a single interface.
markdown:
## Why I built this

Teams kept context-switching between logs, deploy feeds, and runbooks. Signalboard turns those streams into one readable command center.

## Architecture notes

- Event ingestion through a lightweight queue
- Aggregation service for alert grouping
- Frontend stream layer for live updates

## What I learned

I improved my data modeling instincts and got comfortable balancing expressive UI with strict performance budgets.
